news.markdown:
**A brilliant 2017 so far**
We have had a wonderful and very busy first half of 2017. In January we received our fourth Arts Council Grant for the Arts to support development of our new show, **_"It's okay, I'm dealing with it._"**, and for further touring of **_May-We-Go-Round?_**. The work is now newly developed and was performed to sell-out audiences in the Brighton Festival 2017, in a double bill with _May-We-Go-Round?_. _May-We-Go-Round_ was performed at _mac_ Birmingham, The Place London and The Courtyard in Hereford. 

We are delighted to continue touring both shows into Autumn 2017. Come find us on the road!
news.html:
A brilliant 2017 so far
We have had a wonderful and very busy first half of 2017. In January we received our fourth Arts Council Grant for the Arts to support development of our new show, “It’s okay, I’m dealing with it.“, and for further touring of May-We-Go-Round?. The work is now newly developed and was performed to sell-out audiences in the Brighton Festival 2017, in a double bill with May-We-Go-Round?. May-We-Go-Round was performed at mac Birmingham, The Place London and The Courtyard in Hereford.

We are delighted to continue touring both shows into Autumn 2017. Come find us on the road!

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn Performances**
**22 September** --- Swindon Dance --- **[Tickets](http://www.swindondance.org.uk/event/the-hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/)**
**23 September** --- Merlin Theatre, Frome --- **[Tickets](http://www.merlintheatre.co.uk/whats-on/performances/?page=2)**

**_"It's okay, I'm dealing with it._" Autumn Tour**
**15--16 November** --- The Wardrobe Theatre, Bristol --- **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/okay-im-dealing/)**
**17 November** --- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University  --- ** [Tickets](https://www.bathspalive.com/Online/default.asp)**
**18--19 November** --- Camden People's Theatre --- ** [Tickets](https://www.cptheatre.co.uk/production/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it/)**

There will also be an Open Level workshop at The Wardrobe Theatre on 15 November --- **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/workshop-hiccup-project/)**
